body: ### Welcome to Beeswish Mobile apps. Our aim is to test a few concepts & models around mobile apps, publishing chain and technological innovations in native or HTML/JS. *** # Applications ## Rule of Three #### Language: US-FR ### Description You get 2 breads for 3$, how much for 5 breads ? __Rule Of Three__ computes this with famous Rule Of Three _aka Cross Product_. Nothing more, nothing less! The cool feature here is that you can **gesture the cross-product** on your mobile screen and immediately get the result! ### Purpose A very simple application to evaluate different frameworks and gesture features. *** ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Beeswish? Contact us at beeswishapps@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
name: Beeswish Mobile Apps
